text:
Hello

it would be nice if the Rasterizer would have an extra parameter to set the
bitDepth. The PNGImageEncoder has this parameter, but it cannot be set by the
Rasterizer. Especially, if a conversion to a gray image shall be performed.

Just a minor bug: The documentation of the Rasterizer states, that the -bg
parameter has 3 or 4 integers to be seperated by a comma. In fact, it is a colon
which is the delimiter.

Thanks and best regards

Daniel Stainhauser
creator: dstainhauser@ionesoft.ch
deweese@apache.org
text:
The Rasterizer now has '-indexed'.  And the documentation uses '.' as does
the parser as the seperator for colors.
